prompts.en: Describe a near-miss you witnessed or reported during bridge watchkeeping. What action did you take and how was it followed up?
prompts.tr: Köprü vardiyasında şahit olduğun veya raporladığın bir ramak kala olayını anlat. Ne aksiyon aldın ve nasıl takip edildi?

rubric.high: Specific near-miss, immediate reporting, corrective action, crew learning outcome.

prompts.en: How would you handle a situation where a COLREG or bridge procedure conflicts with a request from a charterer or port authority?
prompts.tr: COLREG veya köprü prosedürü ile kiracı veya liman otoritesinden gelen bir talebin çeliştiği bir durumda nasıl davranırsın?

rubric.high: Safety-first decision, references specific COLREG rules, diplomatic communication, escalation.
rubric.mid: Would prioritize safety but unsure about communication approach.
rubric.low: Would comply with external pressure over regulations.

prompts.en: How do you manage risk during mooring/anchoring operations? Include your approach to briefing, PPE, and communications.
prompts.tr: Palamar/demirleme operasyonlarında riski nasıl yönetirsin? Brifing, KKD ve iletişim yaklaşımını dahil et.

rubric.high: Detailed pre-op briefing, PPE checklist, clear communication protocol, snap-back zone awareness.
rubric.mid: Mentions some safety elements but incomplete coverage.
rubric.low: No structured approach to mooring safety.

prompts.en: How do you enforce ISM/permit-to-work discipline, especially during night watches when oversight is reduced?
prompts.tr: Özellikle gözetimin azaldığı gece vardiyalarında ISM/çalışma izni disiplinini nasıl uygularsın?

rubric.high: Specific ISM examples, proactive night-watch checks, documentation discipline, leadership approach.
rubric.mid: Follows ISM but reactive approach to enforcement.

prompts.en: Describe the hot work or enclosed space permit process. Give an example where you exercised stop-work authority.
prompts.tr: Sıcak çalışma veya kapalı alan izin sürecini anlat. İşi durdurma yetkisini kullandığın bir örnek ver.

rubric.high: Full permit process knowledge, specific stop-work example, safety-first decision, documentation.
rubric.mid: Knows permit process but no personal stop-work example.
rubric.low: Unfamiliar with permit procedures or stop-work authority.

prompts.en: How do you ensure Planned Maintenance System (PMS) records are accurate and audit-ready? What happens when records don't match reality?
prompts.tr: Planlı Bakım Sistemi (PMS) kayıtlarının doğru ve denetime hazır olmasını nasıl sağlarsın? Kayıtlar gerçekle uyuşmadığında ne olur?

rubric.high: Proactive record-keeping, regular cross-checks, escalates discrepancies, audit preparation routine.
rubric.mid: Maintains records but reactive to discrepancies.
rubric.low: Records are an afterthought or falsified.

prompts.en: Explain the safety measures you follow during bunkering or fuel transfer operations, including communication and checklist protocols.
prompts.tr: Yakıt alma veya transfer operasyonları sırasında uyguladığın güvenlik önlemlerini, iletişim ve kontrol listesi protokollerini açıkla.

rubric.high: Complete bunkering checklist knowledge, SOPEP awareness, clear communication protocol, spill prevention.
rubric.mid: Follows basic procedures but gaps in communication protocol.
rubric.low: Treats bunkering as routine with no special precautions.

prompts.en: Describe the engine room emergency response process: alarm handling, isolation procedures, and escalation to bridge.
prompts.tr: Makine dairesi acil müdahale sürecini anlat: alarm yönetimi, izolasyon prosedürleri ve köprüye bildirim.

rubric.high: Systematic alarm response, correct isolation sequence, bridge communication, team coordination.
rubric.mid: Knows general process but gaps in isolation or escalation details.
rubric.low: Panics, waits for orders, or no structured response.

prompts.en: How do you manage food safety (HACCP principles), allergen control, and cross-contamination prevention in the galley?
prompts.tr: Mutfakta gıda güvenliğini (HACCP ilkeleri), alerjen kontrolü ve çapraz bulaşma önlemlerini nasıl yönetirsin?

rubric.high: HACCP knowledge, specific allergen protocols, temperature monitoring, separation procedures.
rubric.mid: Basic food safety awareness but gaps in HACCP specifics.

prompts.en: Describe your approach to galley fire prevention, extinguisher use, and drill participation.
prompts.tr: Mutfak yangın önleme, yangın söndürücü kullanımı ve tatbikat katılımı yaklaşımını anlat.

rubric.high: Fire prevention routine, correct extinguisher selection, active drill participation, near-miss awareness.
rubric.mid: Basic fire safety knowledge but limited prevention mindset.
rubric.low: Relies entirely on others for fire safety.

prompts.en: How do you manage stock control (FEFO), cold chain integrity, and food waste reduction on board?
prompts.tr: Gemide stok kontrolü (FEFO), soğuk zincir bütünlüğü ve gıda israfını azaltmayı nasıl yönetirsin?

rubric.high: FEFO knowledge, temperature logs, waste tracking, cost-conscious ordering.
rubric.mid: Basic stock rotation but no structured waste reduction.

prompts.en: How do you maintain hygiene standards during peak service times when time pressure is highest?
prompts.tr: Zaman baskısının en yoğun olduğu servis saatlerinde hijyen standartlarını nasıl korursun?

rubric.high: Structured hygiene routine despite pressure, hand washing discipline, surface sanitization, personal hygiene.
rubric.mid: Maintains hygiene but admits shortcuts under pressure.
